ComicInfo.Summary:
Discover how the Ribbon Queen entered our world! Detective Sun learns how the Ribbon Queen was released into the world by Bella, the murder victim at the center of a series of bizarre crimes who got up and walked out of the morgue the night before. Plus, another supernatural entity has arrived on the scene and targeted Detective Sun’s friend and colleague. Is he there to stop the Ribbon Queen — or does he have his own twisted agenda?
